document_data.name: Eden of the Clearlight
document_data.mainbody: '''Eden of the Clearlight''' was the leader of the [[Coin Spinners]] gang in [[Luskan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3321}}
document_data.Personality: She was a self-proclaimed [[cleric|high priestess]] of [[Tymora]],{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3325}} but in reality she was a self-serving, greedy person with few, if any [[divine]] powers.
document_data.Description: Eden was not an attractive woman.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3767}} She had a lame leg and wore a brace.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3766}} She had one missing eye, in which she wore her platinum coin.
document_data.Possessions:
Eden had a [[magic|magical]] [[platinum]] coin that could absorb most harmful magic, which she wore in her empty eye socket.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|5754}}

Eden lived in the [[Clearlight]], Tymora's run-down temple in Luskan.
document_data.Relationships: Eden was Kalen's older sister but they despised each other.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3761}} Eden enjoyed dallying with hunky men.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|?}}
